comments: Replay review of the foul called on Bamba (ORL) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Bamba (ORL) extends his arm out and makes contact with Brogdon's (IND) arm, which affects his driving shot attempt. Brogdon does not overtly or abruptly clamp Bamba's arm to draw the contact.
Carter Jr. (ORL) establishes himself in a screening position in Hield's (IND) path and absorbs the contact during the pick.
Hield (IND) moves alongside of Wagner (ORL) and brief marginal contact occurs with Wagner's arm during his driving shot attempt.

Jackson (IND) is slightly late to establishes himself in a screening position in Anthony's (ORL) path and marginal contact occurs, which does not affect Anthony's ability to defend his roll to the basket.
Jackson (IND) could be deemed to be in the lane for around three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Jackson (IND) jumps vertically and maintains a legal vertical position contesting the driving shot attempt by Suggs (ORL).
Bamba (ORL) momentarily places a hand/arm to Brogdon's (IND) front and marginal contact occurs, which does not affect Brogdon's SQBR during the drive.
Bamba (ORL) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Brogdon (IND).
Bamba (ORL) could be deemed to be imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Haliburton (IND) legally contests Anthony's (ORL) jump shot attempt.
Anthony's (ORL) shot does not touch the rim and the 24 second shot clock expires.
Wagner (ORL) removes his arm from Brogdon's (IND) path after his steal attempt and marginal contact occurs as they disengage.
Wagner (ORL) makes clean ball contact to poke it loose from Brogdon (IND) and Brogdon is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds. Possession should be awarded to the Magic.
Haliburton (IND) signals for a timeout and is granted one in under five seconds.
Wagner (ORL) commits a take foul on Brogdon (IND).
Haliburton (IND) makes clean ball contact on his dislodge attempt during Anthony's (ORL) driving shot attempt.
Bamba (ORL) slightly extends his arms and marginal contact occurs as he disengages from Brogdon (IND) during the rebound.
Brissett (IND) makes marginal contact with Bamba's (ORL) off-arm during his put-back shot attempt.
Suggs (ORL) maintains a legal guarding position alongside of Brogdon (IND) during the drive and shot attempt.
Carter Jr. (ORL) rests his hand on Brissett (IND) as Hield (IND) extends his arms and delivers contact to his teammate Brissett's back during the rebound.
At the end of the drive, Haliburton (IND) goes to and not through Suggs (ORL) and marginal contact occurs when they come together after Haliburton releases his pass.
Wagner (ORL) grasps Smith's (IND) jersey before separating off-ball.
Smith (IND) is established in Carter Jr.'s (IND) path and braces himself to absorb the marginal contact initiated by Carter Jr. at the end of his drive.
Carter Jr. (ORL) lifts and replants his pivot foot at the start of his dribble.
Carter Jr. (ORL) moves laterally into Hield's (IND) path and makes contact with his body, which affects his SQBR during the drive.
Suggs (ORL) grasps Brissett's (IND) arm to draw additional contact as he runs toward the perimeter on his contest.
Suggs (ORL) stops his forward momentum and incidental foot to foot contact occurs with Hield (IND) on the perimeter.

Replay review of the foul called on Hield (IND) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Hield (IND) legally contests the shot and incidental "high-five" contact occurs after the release. Suggs (ORL) extends his leg out overtly and abnormally to initiate more than marginal contact after the release on his jump shot attempt.
During the inbound, Brogdon (IND) and Wagner (ORL) engage and disengage and the contact is marginal.
Smith (IND) could be deemed to be in the lane for around three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Brogdon (IND) cleanly dislodges the ball from Carter Jr. (ORL) and is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Suggs (ORL) is firming up in Smith's (IND) path and makes marginal contact during the screen.
Anthony (ORL) commits a take foul on Brogdon (IND).
Hield (IND) moves alongside of Suggs (ORL) and marginal contact occurs as they come together when Suggs cuts back inside toward the basket on his driving shot attempt.
Anthony (ORL) makes clean ball contact to tie it up with Hield (IND) and a jump ball is correctly called.
Carter Jr. (ORL) and Smith (IND) come together and incidental contact occurs as they pursue the loose ball.
Carter Jr. (ORL) commits a take foul on Smith (IND).
Brogdon (IND) legally contests and cleanly blocks Suggs' (ORL) jump shot attempt.
